item.description:
Painting Classes with Jill Pottle – Spring 2013 – Registration at the Ryan Estate

It is first come first serve. Sign up today to reserve your spot.

Wednesdays, starting April 24-June 19, 9 sessions

Class #1 9:30-12:30

Painting in Oils or Acrylics – All Levels welcome

This course is for both the new students and artists who wish to acquire more fundamental painting skills and a conceptual understanding of approaches to painting. Demonstrations, lectures and critiques provide practical information on a variety of materials and methods. I am always trying to challenge my students in new and exciting ways. This round of classes we will do a still life or landscape painting the first 4 weeks and then we will have a live clothed live model for a portrait for 5 weeks. Students will work on sketches and paintings geared toward working on solving problems that include: a strong composition, color relationships and perspective. The goal of the class is to have two paintings resolved by the end of the session.

Contact me with questions or comments.

pottleart@verizon.net 978-582-0985 www.pottleart.com http://jillpottle.blogspot.com
Shop at: www.etsy.com/people/jillpottle
item.name: Sign up for Classes at the Ryan Estate in Lincoln, MA
